text: Benson and Hedges were a cigarette manufacturer. The company were bought by the Gallaher Group The name became a brand of the Gallagher. The brand sponsored Formula One racing teams for many years. Founded in 1873 by Richard Benson and William Hedges in London. In April 2007 Japan Tobacco bought the Gallaher Group. ==References== Category:Companies of Japan
title: Benson & Hedges
